description:
SNOCRU is a revolutionary ski tracking app connecting skiers and snowboarders to the mountains on all levels through real time connections with your friends, ski and snowboard tracking, snow reports, and social media. Snowboard Magazine recently ranked SNOCRU as #1 in best iPhone snow apps, and WIRED magazine gave SNOCRU a 9 out of 10 for its ski tracking feature set.  
• Check global snow conditions and ski reports. 
• Ski and snowboard tracking for speed, time, runs, vertical, distance, and more. 
• Connect with friends on the mountain in real time. 
• Find the best après party scene, or a local ski and snowboard shop. 
• Share the whole experience on Facebook and Twitter.  

SNOCRU doesn't just give you info. SNOCRU turns the mountain on!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
Added support for the Pebble Smartwatch so that you can pause & resume tracking and view you speed, vertical and runs right from your wrist!

You can learn more by viewing the Pebble Smartwatch settings from the in-app preferences menu.
